conbody.p: The Deployment Manager allows you to monitor the state of your SenSage AP deployment clusters and components, view current status, analyze anomalies, and make configuration and deployment changes to the SenSage AP system.
To access the Deployment Manager, enter the URL in your browser; when you see the Sign In Screen, enter your username and password.

p.note: The URL to access the Deployment Manager was noted during the installation of the SenSage AP product in the format http://<Server_name_or_IP_address>:8080, at the end of the install.sh instructions.
